Excuse me."},{"lineNumber":26332,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そこで、彼ら魔軍の脅威に対抗する為に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, in order to oppose the threat from those demon armies..."},{"lineNumber":26333,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂らにも手伝えという事かな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you asking us to help too?"},{"lineNumber":26334,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はい。是非、","translatedEnglishLine":"...Yes. By all means,"},{"lineNumber":26335,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ポピンズの技術力をお貸し頂けないでしょうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"could you lend us Poppins' technical skills?"},{"lineNumber":26336,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ、パンツ頂戴。今履いてるの」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, give me your panties. The ones you're wearing now."},{"lineNumber":26337,"originalJapaneseLine":"「パ、ッ……！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wha—!?"},{"lineNumber":26338,"originalJapaneseLine":"「寝ぼけるな、このクソジジイが。","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't be out of your mind, you damn old man."},{"lineNumber":26339,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その禿頭、削ぎ落とすぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll shave off that bald head of yours!"},{"lineNumber":26340,"originalJapaneseLine":"「冗談じゃよ冗談。ほら、セクハラ発言って、","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm joking, just joking. You know how sexual harassment remarks are,"},{"lineNumber":26341,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ツッコミ待ちみたいな所、あるじゃろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"kind of waiting for someone to call them out, right?"},{"lineNumber":26342,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いかん。ブチ殺したくなってきた」","translatedEnglishLine":"No good. I'm starting to want to kill you."},{"lineNumber":26343,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"...................."},{"lineNumber":26344,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ちょっと理解できちゃったんじゃない？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Didn't you kind of understand it a little?"},{"lineNumber":26345,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばっ、ちっげーよ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"N-no, that's not it!?"},{"lineNumber":26346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの、それで、陛下……","translatedEnglishLine":"U-um, so, Your Majesty..."},{"lineNumber":26347,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今の、話は…………","translatedEnglishLine":"That conversation just now..."},{"lineNumber":26348,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふうむ。まあええぞい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm. Well, that's fine."},{"lineNumber":26349,"originalJapaneseLine":"「軽っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"That was light..."},{"lineNumber":26350,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ポピンズは殺し合いを好まんのじゃよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Poppins do not favor killing each other."},{"lineNumber":26351,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とはいえ、現状がまずいのは把握しとる」","translatedEnglishLine":"That said, we understand the current situation is bad."},{"lineNumber":26352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「渡りに船、と言って気を悪くせんで欲しいが。","translatedEnglishLine":"I hope you won't take offense to me saying this is a godsend."},{"lineNumber":26353,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手伝いに回れるならその方が気楽じゃし、","translatedEnglishLine":"If I can help out, it would be easier,"},{"lineNumber":26354,"originalJapaneseLine":"　個別に矢面に立つより長所を活かせるじゃろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and it would let us make better use of our strengths than standing alone at the forefront."},{"lineNumber":26355,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……ありがとうございます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... Thank you very much!"},{"lineNumber":26356,"originalJapaneseLine":"「交易面で、ちょろっと勉強してくれるくらいは、","translatedEnglishLine":"You can expect us to help you learn a little about trading,"},{"lineNumber":26357,"originalJapaneseLine":"　期待してもかまわんじゃろ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's okay to expect that, right?"},{"lineNumber":26358,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい。それはもちろん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-Yes. Of course..."},{"lineNumber":26359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこいらはうちが受け持とか。","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll take responsibility for that area."},{"lineNumber":26360,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お互いに上手くやれるように計らいますわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll arrange things so that we can cooperate well."},{"lineNumber":26361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむうむ。ただ、それとは別に条件が三つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, yes. However, there are three conditions apart from that."},{"lineNumber":26362,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これをクリアしてくれんかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Could you clear these for us?"},{"lineNumber":26363,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言ってみろ。聞くだけ聞いてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Go ahead and say them. I'll listen."},{"lineNumber":26364,"originalJapaneseLine":"　またエロい話だったらブッ殺すからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"But if it's another lewd story, I'll kill you."},{"lineNumber":26365,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ううん……真面目な若者じゃのう。","translatedEnglishLine":"No... you're a serious young man."},{"lineNumber":26366,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃあふたつでええぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, two conditions will do."},{"lineNumber":26367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスが、真面目……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, serious..."},{"lineNumber":26368,"originalJapaneseLine":"「心の友、スケベだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"He's a friend at heart, though he's perverted."},{"lineNumber":26369,"originalJapaneseLine":"　意外と下ネタは好きじゃないよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Surprisingly, he doesn't actually like dirty jokes."},{"lineNumber":26370,"originalJapaneseLine":"　特に言われるの」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've been told that especially."},{"lineNumber":26371,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かっててあんなに連発してるの、普段……」","translatedEnglishLine":"He normally understands that but still keeps throwing them out one after another..."},{"lineNumber":26372,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まずひとつ。","translatedEnglishLine":"First, one condition."},{"lineNumber":26373,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アニャガス王国とは同盟を結ばんで欲しい」","translatedEnglishLine":"We don't want you to form an alliance with the Kingdom of Anyagas."},{"lineNumber":26374,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アニャガス、ってもうひとつのポピンズの……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyagas is the other Poppins'..."},{"lineNumber":26375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ。儂らの不倶戴天の敵じゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes. They are our bitterest enemies."},{"lineNumber":26376,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ、不倶戴天……そこまで……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"B-bitterest enemies... to that extent...?"},{"lineNumber":26377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何か、あったんですか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Did something happen?"},{"lineNumber":26378,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それとも、もともとそんな関係なんですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Or were you always like that?"},{"lineNumber":26379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ……ちょいと長い話をするとじゃのう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes... It's a bit of a long story..."},{"lineNumber":26380,"originalJapaneseLine":"満鉄王は、それまでの適度に緩んだ表情から、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Mantetsu King, who until then had a moderately relaxed expression,"},{"lineNumber":26381,"originalJapaneseLine":"やや顔を引き締めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"tightened his face somewhat."},{"lineNumber":26382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「昔は別に悪いというほどのものじゃなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It wasn't something bad enough to be called so in the past."},{"lineNumber":26383,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カラクリカップでも、健全に競ってたわい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even in the Karakuri Cup, we competed healthily."},{"lineNumber":26384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カラクリ……何？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Karakuri...? What's that?"},{"lineNumber":26385,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ポピンズの競技大会やね。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a Poppins competition event."},{"lineNumber":26386,"originalJapaneseLine":"　両国間で毎年色んな技能で勝負しとんねん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Every year, the two countries compete in various skills."},{"lineNumber":26387,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だがのう……儂の一人娘、日立が！　日立が！」","translatedEnglishLine":"But, you see... my only daughter, Hitachi! Hitachi!"},{"lineNumber":26388,"originalJapaneseLine":"満鉄王は空を仰いだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Mantetsu King looked up to the sky."},{"lineNumber":26389,"originalJapaneseLine":"「娘……っていってもちっちゃいんだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Though you say daughter, she's still little, isn't she?"},{"lineNumber":26390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無論。娘は、たぶらかされたのじゃ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course. My daughter was deceived!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こほん。失礼しました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahem. Excuse me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで、彼ら魔軍の脅威に対抗する為に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, in order to oppose the threat from those demon armies...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂らにも手伝えという事かな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you asking us to help too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……はい。是非、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Yes. By all means,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポピンズの技術力をお貸し頂けないでしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could you lend us Poppins' technical skills?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、パンツ頂戴。今履いてるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, give me your panties. The ones you're wearing now.
Wha—!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「寝ぼけるな、このクソジジイが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't be out of your mind, you damn old man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その禿頭、削ぎ落とすぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll shave off that bald head of yours!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「冗談じゃよ冗談。ほら、セクハラ発言って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm joking, just joking. You know how sexual harassment remarks are,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツッコミ待ちみたいな所、あるじゃろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: kind of waiting for someone to call them out, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いかん。ブチ殺したくなってきた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good. I'm starting to want to kill you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ちょっと理解できちゃったんじゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Didn't you kind of understand it a little?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばっ、ちっげーよ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-no, that's not it!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あの、それで、陛下……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U-um, so, Your Majesty...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の、話は…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That conversation just now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふうむ。まあええぞい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm. Well, that's fine.
That was light...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ポピンズは殺し合いを好まんのじゃよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Poppins do not favor killing each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とはいえ、現状がまずいのは把握しとる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That said, we understand the current situation is bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「渡りに船、と言って気を悪くせんで欲しいが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hope you won't take offense to me saying this is a godsend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手伝いに回れるならその方が気楽じゃし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I can help out, it would be easier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 個別に矢面に立つより長所を活かせるじゃろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it would let us make better use of our strengths than standing alone at the forefront.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……ありがとうございます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... Thank you very much!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「交易面で、ちょろっと勉強してくれるくらいは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can expect us to help you learn a little about trading,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 期待してもかまわんじゃろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay to expect that, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい。それはもちろん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-Yes. Of course...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこいらはうちが受け持とか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll take responsibility for that area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互いに上手くやれるように計らいますわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll arrange things so that we can cooperate well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむうむ。ただ、それとは別に条件が三つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, yes. However, there are three conditions apart from that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これをクリアしてくれんかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could you clear these for us?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言ってみろ。聞くだけ聞いてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Go ahead and say them. I'll listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またエロい話だったらブッ殺すからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But if it's another lewd story, I'll kill you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううん……真面目な若者じゃのう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... you're a serious young man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあふたつでええぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, two conditions will do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスが、真面目……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, serious...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「心の友、スケベだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's a friend at heart, though he's perverted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外と下ネタは好きじゃないよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surprisingly, he doesn't actually like dirty jokes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に言われるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been told that especially.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かっててあんなに連発してるの、普段……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He normally understands that but still keeps throwing them out one after another...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずひとつ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, one condition.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニャガス王国とは同盟を結ばんで欲しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't want you to form an alliance with the Kingdom of Anyagas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アニャガス、ってもうひとつのポピンズの……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyagas is the other Poppins'...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ。儂らの不倶戴天の敵じゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes. They are our bitterest enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ、不倶戴天……そこまで……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B-bitterest enemies... to that extent...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何か、あったんですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did something happen?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも、もともとそんな関係なんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or were you always like that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ……ちょいと長い話をするとじゃのう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes... It's a bit of a long story...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満鉄王は、それまでの適度に緩んだ表情から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Mantetsu King, who until then had a moderately relaxed expression,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やや顔を引き締めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: tightened his face somewhat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔は別に悪いというほどのものじゃなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It wasn't something bad enough to be called so in the past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラクリカップでも、健全に競ってたわい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even in the Karakuri Cup, we competed healthily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カラクリ……何？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Karakuri...? What's that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ポピンズの競技大会やね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a Poppins competition event.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両国間で毎年色んな技能で勝負しとんねん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Every year, the two countries compete in various skills.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だがのう……儂の一人娘、日立が！　日立が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, you see... my only daughter, Hitachi! Hitachi!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満鉄王は空を仰いだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Mantetsu King looked up to the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「娘……っていってもちっちゃいんだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though you say daughter, she's still little, isn't she?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無論。娘は、たぶらかされたのじゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course. My daughter was deceived!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

My daughter was deceived!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こほん。失礼しました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahem. Excuse me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで、彼ら魔軍の脅威に対抗する為に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, in order to oppose the threat from those demon armies...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂らにも手伝えという事かな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you asking us to help too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……はい。是非、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Yes. By all means,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポピンズの技術力をお貸し頂けないでしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could you lend us Poppins' technical skills?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、パンツ頂戴。今履いてるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, give me your panties. The ones you're wearing now.
Wha—!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「寝ぼけるな、このクソジジイが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't be out of your mind, you damn old man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その禿頭、削ぎ落とすぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll shave off that bald head of yours!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「冗談じゃよ冗談。ほら、セクハラ発言って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm joking, just joking. You know how sexual harassment remarks are,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツッコミ待ちみたいな所、あるじゃろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: kind of waiting for someone to call them out, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いかん。ブチ殺したくなってきた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No good. I'm starting to want to kill you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ちょっと理解できちゃったんじゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Didn't you kind of understand it a little?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばっ、ちっげーよ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-no, that's not it!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あの、それで、陛下……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U-um, so, Your Majesty...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の、話は…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That conversation just now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふうむ。まあええぞい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm. Well, that's fine.
That was light...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ポピンズは殺し合いを好まんのじゃよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Poppins do not favor killing each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とはいえ、現状がまずいのは把握しとる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That said, we understand the current situation is bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「渡りに船、と言って気を悪くせんで欲しいが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hope you won't take offense to me saying this is a godsend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手伝いに回れるならその方が気楽じゃし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I can help out, it would be easier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 個別に矢面に立つより長所を活かせるじゃろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it would let us make better use of our strengths than standing alone at the forefront.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……ありがとうございます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... Thank you very much!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「交易面で、ちょろっと勉強してくれるくらいは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can expect us to help you learn a little about trading,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 期待してもかまわんじゃろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay to expect that, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい。それはもちろん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-Yes. Of course...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこいらはうちが受け持とか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll take responsibility for that area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互いに上手くやれるように計らいますわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll arrange things so that we can cooperate well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむうむ。ただ、それとは別に条件が三つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, yes. However, there are three conditions apart from that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これをクリアしてくれんかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could you clear these for us?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言ってみろ。聞くだけ聞いてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Go ahead and say them. I'll listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またエロい話だったらブッ殺すからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But if it's another lewd story, I'll kill you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううん……真面目な若者じゃのう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... you're a serious young man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあふたつでええぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, two conditions will do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスが、真面目……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, serious...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「心の友、スケベだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's a friend at heart, though he's perverted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外と下ネタは好きじゃないよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surprisingly, he doesn't actually like dirty jokes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に言われるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been told that especially.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かっててあんなに連発してるの、普段……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He normally understands that but still keeps throwing them out one after another...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずひとつ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, one condition.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニャガス王国とは同盟を結ばんで欲しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't want you to form an alliance with the Kingdom of Anyagas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アニャガス、ってもうひとつのポピンズの……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyagas is the other Poppins'...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ。儂らの不倶戴天の敵じゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes. They are our bitterest enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ、不倶戴天……そこまで……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B-bitterest enemies... to that extent...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何か、あったんですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did something happen?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも、もともとそんな関係なんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or were you always like that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ……ちょいと長い話をするとじゃのう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes... It's a bit of a long story...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満鉄王は、それまでの適度に緩んだ表情から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Mantetsu King, who until then had a moderately relaxed expression,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やや顔を引き締めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: tightened his face somewhat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔は別に悪いというほどのものじゃなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It wasn't something bad enough to be called so in the past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラクリカップでも、健全に競ってたわい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even in the Karakuri Cup, we competed healthily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カラクリ……何？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Karakuri...? What's that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ポピンズの競技大会やね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a Poppins competition event.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両国間で毎年色んな技能で勝負しとんねん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Every year, the two countries compete in various skills.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だがのう……儂の一人娘、日立が！　日立が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, you see... my only daughter, Hitachi! Hitachi!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満鉄王は空を仰いだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Mantetsu King looked up to the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「娘……っていってもちっちゃいんだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though you say daughter, she's still little, isn't she?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無論。娘は、たぶらかされたのじゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course. My daughter was deceived!
